$comment: This schema is work with jupyter lab extension settings

mode.description: In this mode, neovim is server and neovim plugin(neopyter) is listening to `remote_address`, the browser where jupyter lab is located will connect to neovim

ip.description: IP of the host where neovim is located, neovim plugin(neopyter) will listen to the IP. e.g. `10.25.69.51`

port.description: Port of the neovim plugin(neopyter) is located, neovim will listen to the port. e.g. `9001`

mode.description: In this mode, jupyter lab server(server side, the host you run `jupyter lab` to start JupyterLab) is server and jupyter lab server extension(neopyter) is listening to `${IP}:{Port}`, the neovim plugin(neopyter) will connect to `${IP}:{Port}`

ip.description: IP of the host where jupyter server is located, jupyter lab server extension(neopyter) will listen to the IP, please use `,` to split multiple. e.g. `127.0.0.1,10.25.69.51`

port.description: Port of the jupyter server extension(neopyter) is listening to. e.g. `9001`
